00059 #ifndef min
00060 #define min(a,b) ((a) < (b) ? (a) : (b))

00062

00064 #define max(a,b) ((a) > (b) ? (a) : (b))

00068 #define abs(a) ((a) < 0 ? (-a) : (a))

00116 #define log2(x) (log(x) / M_LOG2_E)
00117 #define _fabs(x) ( (x) < 0.0 ? (-x) : (x) )
